schema.prompt:
Create a detailed {{input.format}} script on the topic: {{input.topic}}

Target Length: {{input.targetLength}}
Target Audience: {{input.audience}}
Format Preference: {{input.formatPreference}}
Tone: {{input.tone}}

{{#if input.keyPoints}}Key Points to Cover:
{{input.keyPoints}}{{/if}}

{{#if input.specialRequirements}}Special Requirements:
{{input.specialRequirements}}{{/if}}

Script Structure Requirements:
1. **Opening/Hook** ({{#eq input.format "Video"}}0:00-0:30{{else}}First 30 seconds{{/eq}})
   - Attention-grabbing introduction
   - Preview of what's coming
   - Why viewers/listeners should stay

2. **Introduction** ({{#eq input.format "Video"}}0:30-1:00{{else}}30 seconds - 1 minute{{/eq}})
   - Host introduction (if applicable)
   - Topic introduction
   - Value proposition

3. **Main Content Segments**
   - Clear section breaks
   - Logical flow between topics
   - {{#eq input.format "Video"}}Visual cues and B-roll suggestions{{else}}Audio transitions and music cues{{/eq}}

4. **Engagement Elements**
   - Questions to audience
   - {{#eq input.format "Video"}}Call-to-action overlays{{else}}Listener participation prompts{{/eq}}
   - Interactive moments

5. **Conclusion** (Last 30-60 seconds)
   - Key takeaways summary
   - Call to action
   - Next episode teaser (if series)

6. **Technical Notes**
   - {{#eq input.format "Video"}}Camera angles, graphics, text overlays{{else}}Sound effects, music cues, pacing notes{{/eq}}
   - Timing markers
   - Production notes

Provide:
- Complete narration script with timing markers
- {{#eq input.format "Video"}}Visual directions and B-roll suggestions{{else}}Audio cues and transition notes{{/eq}}
- Engagement prompts and CTAs
- Production notes and tips

props.placeholder: Who is your audience? (age, interests, knowledge level...)
List the main points or sections you want to include...
Any specific requirements? (sponsor mentions, disclaimers, series continuity...)

translations.name: Video/Podcast Script Writer
translations.description: Creates detailed scripts for videos or podcast episodes with proper flow, timing, and engagement elements. Includes narration text, cues for pauses/music, visual directions for videos, and production notes. Structures content for maximum audience retention.
translations.instructions:
1. Enter your video or podcast topic
2. Choose the format (video or podcast)
3. Select target length and style
4. Specify your audience and desired tone
5. Add any key points you want covered

The script will include:
- Complete narration with timing markers
- Opening hook and introduction
- Structured main content segments
- Engagement prompts and CTAs
- Visual/audio cues as appropriate
- Production notes and tips
